message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and high-quality item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I can see that you're interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell it to you for $180.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for the product.
